title.rendered: Chinese New Year at Explorations V Museum

content.rendered:
Sifu Och Wing Chun Kung Fu does charity show for Explorations V Museum in Downtown Lakeland Florida.

The Sifu Och Wing Chun Lakeland Lion Dance and Dragon Dance team did a wonderful Chinese New Year celebration and show at Downtown Lakeland’s Exploration V Museum. There was quite the crowd both inside and outside of the museum this last weekend as the Sifu Och Wing Chun Kung Fu team performed the Chinese Lion Dance with authentic Chinese live music and drums. The performance had leaps, tail chasing, children running and laughing-as well as a few kids who got to get inside the dragon and perform along with the Chinese New Year celebration event.

Sifu Och and the Chinese Lion Dance team performed all of this, donating their time for the benefit of the downtown Explorations V Museum. It was a wonderful event and show for the good luck and prosperity of both businesses in the new year. Sifu Och Wing Chun Kung Fu cares about kids development and safety and you can’t beat the fun a HUGE red dragon jumping, playing, and running amuck outdoors!

If you’re interested in having a Chinese Lion Dance perform for your Chinese New Year, birthday party or special event, contact Sifu Och Wing Chun at sifuoch@facebook.com.

@graph.name: Sifu Och Wing Chun
@graph.description: Kung Fu and Martial Arts for Kids & Adults in Lakeland, Florida

@graph.name: Sifu Justin Och
@graph.description: Sifu Justin Och has direct Ip Man lineage instruction under the Ip Ching, Ip Chun, Simon Lau, and Moy Yat system and spent his life training and advancing students in the Wing Chun Kung Fu system here in Lakeland Florida. He is also the Southeastern USA Regional Director of the World Ving Tsun Association for the America's.
